title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Greece 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2023.
The line significantly increased by 1.32 from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum GDP growth rate compared to previous year, about 2.22 was reported at Year 2020
Minimum GDP growth rate compared to previous year about 0.19 was reached at Year 2016
